name: Job Card Planning Qty
query:
SELECT %(Week)s               as "Week:Int:40",
       %(Year)s               as "Year:Int:40",
       `tabWork Order`.name                   as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:130",
       `tabWork Order`.expected_delivery_date as "Expected Delivery Date:Date:120",
       `tabWork Order`.status                 as "Work Order - Status:Data:200",
       `tabCustomer`.name                     as "Customer:Link/Customer:130",
       `tabCustomer`.customer_name            as "Customer Name:Data:100",
       `tabWork Order`.production_item        as "Item:Link/Item:150",
       tabItem.item_name                      as "Item Name:Data:100",
       `tabWork Order`.qty                    as "Qty To Produce:Int:150",
       `tabWork Order`.produced_qty           as "Qty Produced:Int:150",
       `tabJob Card`.name                     as "Job Card:Link/Job Card:120",
       `tabJob Card`.status                   as "Job Card - Status:Data:150",
       `tabJob Card`.planned_start_date       as "Planned Start Date:Date:120",
       `tabJob Card`.planned_employee_name    as "Planned employee:Data:100",
       `tabJob Card`.for_quantity             as "Job Card - Qty To Produce:Int:150",
       `tabJob Card`.total_completed_qty      as "Job Card - Qty Produced:Int:150"

FROM `tabJob Card`
         INNER JOIN `tabWork Order` ON `tabWork Order`.name = `tabJob Card`.work_order
         INNER JOIN `tabItem` ON `tabItem`.item_name = `tabWork Order`.item_name
         LEFT JOIN `tabSales Order` ON `tabSales Order`.name = `tabWork Order`.sales_order
         LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` ON `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Order`.customer
WHERE `tabWork Order`.status NOT IN ('Cancelled', 'Draft')
  AND ((DATE_FORMAT(`tabJob Card`.planned_start_date, '%%v%%Y') = %(Week)s%(Year)s OR
       (DATE_FORMAT(`tabWork Order`.expected_delivery_date, '%%v%%Y') = %(Week)s%(Year)s) OR
       (DATE_FORMAT(`tabWork Order`.planned_start_date, '%%v%%Y') = %(Week)s%(Year)s)))
